name: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Dill Sauce
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat (375–400°F).
Brush salmon with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Grill salmon skin-side down for 4–5 minutes, flip, and cook another 3–4 minutes until flakes easily.
In a small bowl, mix yogurt, lemon zest, lemon juice, and dill.
Serve salmon topped with lemon dill sauce.
recommendedSides: Grilled asparagus with olive oil and garlic

name: Crockpot Beef Stew
instructions: Add all ingredients to the crockpot.
Cook on low for 8 hours or high for 4 hours.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot.

name: Oven-Baked Lemon Herb Cod
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Place cod in a baking dish, drizzle with olive oil, and season with oregano, salt, and pepper.
Layer lemon slices over fish.
Bake for 12–15 minutes until fish flakes easily.
Garnish with parsley before serving.
